original_text: And there shall dwell in Judah itself, and in all the cities thereof together, husbandmen, and they that go forth with flocks.
korean_text: 유다와 그 모든 성읍의 농부와 양 떼를 인도하는 자가 거기에 함께 살리니

sentences.original_text: And there shall dwell in Judah itself
and in all the cities thereof together
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 성읍에 함께 거할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they that go forth with flocks
